title: How to improve my handwriting for neat work and for exams - Quora

response.answer_text: Practice makes one perfect and that applies on handwriting too. Nothing can be learnt without practice. At first you have to correct your allignment of letters and words. When you write no letters and words respective of one another shold be above or below the line. This affects the attractiveness of your handwriting. see the image below.  After correcting the above try to improve the shape of your letters, for this you can use worksheets which is easily avalable in the market. Like the image below.  Letter dots in the worksheets help to improve the shape. You can download these worksheets from internet after that print out them for practice. After doing above things practice more on blank page to see the progress of your handwriting. Hope it helps !

The only answer is to practice a lot and pay attention to letter formation. You have to slow down and get it right before you can go faster without thinking about it. Don’t give up. It pays off over time.
